about_the_game:
A major hurricane swept through the state and unfortunately caused a lot of damage to logistical points, including structures and data facilities. But don't worry, we're here to help and get everything back up and running as soon as possible!


Story:
A company for the restoration of infrastructure in emergency regions, has sent its best specialist, providing everything he needs to solve the task that has arisen.

Gameplay:
The player's main task is to restore the state of the area damaged by the hurricane, making everything work as it did before, or even better!


Overcoming:
On the way there may be various terrain difficulties, as well as natural ones, in order to overcome them you need to think about improving your transportation. Not every vehicle is suitable for overcoming some difficulties, because each vehicle has its own advantages and disadvantages.

Weather and Seasons:
The game world will feature dynamic seasons, transitioning from spring to winter landscapes in real time. These seasonal changes, along with the weather, will affect the surfaces of the game world, making it more challenging to navigate your car.


Transportation:
During gameplay, you can enhance your car's performance by upgrading its unique characteristics! You can also increase your driver's level to improve your vehicle and driving skills. Get ready to elevate your driving experience!


Game Character:
To improve your character's driving skills and confidence, try leveling up your driver. This will also help you handle unexpected breakdowns without needing to visit a repair shop.


Home Improvements:
At the beginning of the game, you'll have access to a base that can be upgraded both technically and visually. You can add all the necessary amenities for you and your car, such as improving your bed or adding a refrigerator. Additionally, your car can have a second garage compartment or a technical compartment to accommodate more vehicles and refine them without leaving the garage.

Main features of the game:
  • Experience a seamless and open world where you can choose your own path!
  • Discover different types and classes of cars, each with unique exteriors and technical tuning!
  • Embrace the changing weather and seasons! They provide a new and exciting perspective on the world.
  • Navigate through complex landscapes and overcome natural obstacles that may impede your progress!
  • Monitor your character and vehicle performance closely!
  • The dynamic world will make your driving experience more exciting!

About the Game

A major hurricane swept through the state and unfortunately caused a lot of damage to logistical points, including structures and data facilities. But don't worry, we're here to help and get everything back up and running as soon as possible!


Story:
A company for the restoration of infrastructure in emergency regions, has sent its best specialist, providing everything he needs to solve the task that has arisen.

Gameplay:
The player's main task is to restore the state of the area damaged by the hurricane, making everything work as it did before, or even better!


Overcoming:
On the way there may be various terrain difficulties, as well as natural ones, in order to overcome them you need to think about improving your transportation. Not every vehicle is suitable for overcoming some difficulties, because each vehicle has its own advantages and disadvantages.

Weather and Seasons:
The game world will feature dynamic seasons, transitioning from spring to winter landscapes in real time. These seasonal changes, along with the weather, will affect the surfaces of the game world, making it more challenging to navigate your car.


Transportation:
During gameplay, you can enhance your car's performance by upgrading its unique characteristics! You can also increase your driver's level to improve your vehicle and driving skills. Get ready to elevate your driving experience!


Game Character:
To improve your character's driving skills and confidence, try leveling up your driver. This will also help you handle unexpected breakdowns without needing to visit a repair shop.


Home Improvements:
At the beginning of the game, you'll have access to a base that can be upgraded both technically and visually. You can add all the necessary amenities for you and your car, such as improving your bed or adding a refrigerator. Additionally, your car can have a second garage compartment or a technical compartment to accommodate more vehicles and refine them without leaving the garage.

Main features of the game:
  • Experience a seamless and open world where you can choose your own path!
  • Discover different types and classes of cars, each with unique exteriors and technical tuning!
  • Embrace the changing weather and seasons! They provide a new and exciting perspective on the world.
  • Navigate through complex landscapes and overcome natural obstacles that may impede your progress!
  • Monitor your character and vehicle performance closely!
  • The dynamic world will make your driving experience more exciting!
name: Delivery Driver Service: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400 / Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia geforce gtx 1650 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5‑11320H / AMD Ryzen 5 5500U
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia geforce rtx 3060 / Radeon RX 6600
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Start your first journey to rebuild the state after the recent hurricane in Prologue by loading up your truck! Get ready to explore the game world and become the ultimate Delivery Driver!
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Czech, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
